name: Anatopy
description:
Anatopy is an anachronism, but for a location.

The world is upside down! Try to save everyone by cleaning this mess. Snowmen have to be in the winter world and balloons in summer !

- Corner-right camera is your mirror image in the other world

- Right trigger 🎮 / shift ⌨️ to flip the world !

- A 🎮 /Spacebar ⌨️ to jump

- Your can grab objects by pressing X 🎮 or E ⌨️

Find all the objects and put them at their right place 🎉

Music comes from opengameart.com : 

For the menu : https://opengameart.org/content/snow-about-a-castle

For the game : https://matthewpablo.com/music/
